about_the_game:
Introduction:


  • Play as a new Caravan and discover one of your ancestors' secrets, which will rekindle the hope of ending the Phithi era someday.
  • Every decade, the tree city of Lecwasi sends a caravan of merchants and diplomats into the Phithi, the meteorological chaos ravaging the world of Uwando.
  • Convoy goods to neighboring tribes, build relationships, survive the creatures that roam around the Phithi, and collect memories of your journey to send to your successors.

Features:


  • Guide a caravan of adventurers through ever-changing landscapes.
  • Tame hostile creatures, rescue refugees, seek allies for mutual aid, or follow the blood path and loot everything you can.
  • Seek rich arable soil to plant a new tree city for your people.
  • Progress by passing on your knowledge to a new caravan.
  • Repair the broken climate, and put an end to centuries of wandering.

Sandwalkers is made by the same studio as Legend of Keepers: Career of a Dungeon Manager.

Games/Series that inspired us:


HeroQuest (board game), La Horde du Contrevent (Windwalkers, a French book), Kaamelott (the best French series), Monty Python (English series), Dune.

Video games that inspired us:


Curious Expedition, Renowned Explorers, Trials of Fire, Darkest Dungeon, Slay the Spire, Final Fantasy, Divinity, For The King, Chroma Squad, Battle Brothers, West of Loathing, and many more.

Sandwalkers Prologue is a free version of the game Sandwalkers.

What is the difference from the previous "Sandwalkers: The 14th Caravan"?


This version focuses more on the gameplay, whereas the previous one introduced the narrative part.
